title: 10 years special have my icon but i didnt get the mystery skin yet
body: 10 years special have my icon but i didnt get the mystery skin yet :(

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like the Anniversary icon was unlocked on September 17th.  Riot Kayle was unlocked just before.  The anniversary gift was for Riot Kayle.  Those who already had her before the event received a mystery gift instead.  Hope that helps clear things up!
Yes thanks, I already had riot kayle so I shouda get a mystery gift.

> [{quoted}](name=HappyFIower,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KTctAlaR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-11T18:22:05.068+0000)
>
> Yes thanks, I already had riot kayle so I shouda get a mystery gift.

From what I can see, Riot Kayle wasn't on the account until September 16th.  If you have any concerns or need more clarification on the specifics, our account team would be happy help you individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll respond as soon as possible!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KTctAlaR,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-11T18:25:44.619+0000)
>
> From what I can see, Riot Kayle wasn't on the account until September 16th.  If you have any concerns or need more clarification on the specifics, our account team would be happy help you individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll respond as soon as possible!

Is it possible that I can see that, bc i really thought i bought all rito skins?

> [{quoted}](name=HappyFIower,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KTctAlaR,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-11T18:40:07.340+0000)
>
> Is it possible that I can see that, bc i really thought i bought all rito skins?

It should show up in your store's purchase history section through the client.  If it's not there, we can provide you that info through the ticket!
Nothing, no riot kayle or any skin, other then skt alistar what i bought today. i only see the icon in the history.
I created a ticket now, thanks for u time atleast. If you cant help me more??
